title: About disconnect issues
body: I am just wondering if i am going to get leavebuster cause i cant connect to a game of Draft

replies.body: If you do keep entering into games and getting disconnected, there is a chance of getting an LPQ eventually. Let's take a minute to go over the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can stop that from happening.
